notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: H.P. initialised the study, contributed to data collection, conceptualized the manuscript and contributed to writing the manuscript. P.B. developed the methodological approach of the analysis and contributed to writing. E.U. conceptualized the study, contributed to data collection and to writing. J.D. collected and prepared most of the data, supported analyses and contributed to writing. G.S. conducted tree ring analyses. D.P. contributed to tree ring analyses, to data quality, and to writing. T.R. revised the manuscript. J.C., T.K., T.v.C., A.C., B.d.T., K.F., B.L. contributed to developing the city specific sampling designs, and supported the manuscript writing process with their local expert knowledge.
